title: How to Make a Baked Potato on the Stove Top

steps.headline: Clean out an old coffee can and the lid of a jar.
Place the jar lid on the base of the coffee can.
Rest the potato on the jar lid.
Place on a very low flame or heat setting on the stove.
Leave to cook for 20 minutes.
steps.description: Check regularly to avoid burning. After the time for cooking is up, you should have a delicious "baked" potato.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Add a filling and a salad and you have a complete meal.
